1.text: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing  champions and gaining  bonus movement speed based on its proximity to the target.

descend

1.text: Toggle: Elise switches between her  Human Form and  Spider Form.
1.html: Toggle: Elise switches between her Human Form and Spider Form.

2.text: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed,  melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored  Spiderlings.
2.html: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed, melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored Spiderlings.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Elise fires a web in the target direction,  stunning the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also  revealed.

textContent.text: Active: Elise  pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against  monsters.
textContent.html: Active: Elise pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Elise  pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against  monsters.

Active: Elise  pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against  monsters.

markedPassages: (+ 8% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's missing health)

textContent.text: If there are active  Spiderlings or  Volatile Spiderlings nearby, they will  dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.
textContent.html: If there are active Spiderlings or Volatile Spiderlings nearby, they will dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.

textContent.text: Passive: Elise's  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed.
textContent.html: Passive: Elise's Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed.

skillTabs.concerningText: Passive: Elise's  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed.

markedPassages: Spiderlings
bonus attack speed
Spiderling

textContent.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Elise and her Spiderlings gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

markedPassages: Spiderlings

textContent.text: Skittering Frenzy  resets Elise's basic attack timer. Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to  Human Form.
textContent.html: Skittering Frenzy resets Elise's basic attack timer. Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to Human Form.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Skittering Frenzy  resets Elise's basic attack timer. Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to  Human Form.

textContent.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings lift up into the air,  vanishing and becoming  unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting  sight of the area for the duration.
textContent.html: Active: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air, vanishing and becoming unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting sight of the area for the duration.
markedPassages: Spiderlings
vanishing
unable to act
sight

textContent.text: Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.
textContent.html: Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.

textContent.text: Recast: Elise and her  Spiderlings instantly  descend behind the target, or their current position if there is no target.
textContent.html: Recast: Elise and her Spiderlings instantly descend behind the target, or their current position if there is no target.
markedPassages: Spiderlings
descend

textContent.text: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her  Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way,  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
textContent.html: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way, Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her  Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way,  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.

markedPassages: Spiderlings
Spider Queen's

textContent.text: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
textContent.html: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

textContent.text: Passive:  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased.
textContent.html: Passive: Spider Queen's bonuses are increased.
markedPassages: Spider Queen's

textContent.text: Toggle: Elise switches between her  Human Form and  Spider Form.
textContent.html: Toggle: Elise switches between her Human Form and Spider Form.

textContent.text: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed,  melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored  Spiderlings.
textContent.html: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed, melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored Spiderlings.
markedPassages: 25 bonus movement speed
melee
125 range
Spiderlings

textContent.text: Human Form: Elise transforms into a human, gaining  ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, she stores all active Spiderlings.
textContent.html: Human Form: Elise transforms into a human, gaining ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, she stores all active Spiderlings.
markedPassages: ranged

textContent.text: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
textContent.html: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (30 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
